FDG.function_description: Social media content browsing (推荐 tab), posts & interactions

core_logic.logic: The app starts on page 0. First, the user clicks the '推荐' (Recommend) tab in the top navigation (which is already the current tab, so the page remains 0). Then, the user clicks the '最右' (Zuiyou) bottom tab, which also keeps the page as 0. These actions are part of navigating or confirming the social media content browsing in the '推荐' tab.

steps.summary: Click '推荐' tab in top navigation (current tab, page remains 0)
Click '最右' bottom tab (page remains 0)

FDG.function_description: The "话题广场" (Topic Plaza) page in the app's "话题" (Topic) section allows users to browse, search for, and join various topic groups (with options to create topics), organized by categories like 推荐 (Recommended), 小编精选 (Editor's Picks), 搞笑 (Humor), etc., and view topic - related posts and interaction counts.
data_out: 返回后的推荐页面内容

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the main page and clicks the '话题' tab to navigate to the topic section. From there, they click the '话题广场' tab to enter the Topic Plaza. In the plaza, the user can either input a topic in the search field (e.g., '搞笑话题') or click a category tab (e.g., '推荐') to browse topics, with the flow allowing for repeated interaction with search/navigation.

steps.summary: Click '话题' tab to enter topic section
Click '话题广场' tab to enter Topic Plaza
Input topic (e.g., '搞笑话题') in search field
Click category tab (e.g., '推荐') to browse topics

branches.condition: User wants to search a topic
User wants to browse by category

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to search for content, view historical searches, explore featured sections (like 章鱼周刊, 发现话题), and browse trending topics (最右热榜) with options to engage with popular posts or subscribe to the hotlist.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the search icon to enter the search page. On the search page, users can input a query (e.g., '悬疑电影') and execute the search. After searching, users can also interact with the '话题' tab. Navigation back to the previous page is possible via the back button.

steps.summary: Click search icon to enter search page
Click back button to return to previous page
Input search query in search field
Click search execution button to perform search
Click '话题' tab button

Click back navigation arrow to return to the original page

Click close button to dismiss share popup
